0: AN ACT AUTHORIZING A LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNIT TO CREATE A CORPORATE ENTITY AND/OR AUTHORITY TO ATTRACT DOMESTIC AND FOREIGN INVESTMENT TO GENERATE ADDITIONAL SOURCE OF REVENUE AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on LOCAL GOVERNMENT since 2019-07-31
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02911
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AUTHORIZING A LOCAL GOVERNMENT UNIT TO CREATE A CORPORATE ENTITY AND/OR AUTHORITY TO ATTRACT DOMESTIC AND FOREIGN INVESTMENT TO GENERATE ADDITIONAL SOURCE OF REVENUE AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Seeks to subscribe to the view that LGUs, as "corporations," may engage in business economic enterprise, or investment of nature that will generate additional revenue that would accrue to the LGUs. Proposes to allow LGUs some degree of freedom and independence in pursuing commercial and service enterprises, as the case may be, as long as it should be generally consistent with the local development plan and the corresponding public investment program of that LGU.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, PRECIOUS HIPOLITO
DATE FILED : 2019-07-25
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON LOCAL GOVERNMENT ON 2019-07-31
